description: Timeless sweater goodness updated with high-tech materials. Acr’teryx’s Covert line offers slick looking outwear that is at home on hut-trips or trips to the corner store. Crafted from a warm heathered fleece, it's a great choice for cool fall days and layers well when the weather turns truly nasty.Uses Arc’teryx’s Alpenex II™ heathered fleece, a lightweight and breathable fleece that wears well and packs well.Stealthy underarm gussets allow and improved range of movement while keeping with the top’s clean lines.Laminated chest pocket gives you a secure place to stash small necessities.Bound cuffs and hemline eliminate the risk of fraying.Regular fit wears like you want it to, no surprises.
name: Arc'teryx Covert Sweater - Women's
